item.title: Python
item.description: We’ve created a few examples on how to interact with WAHA WhatsApp HTTP API with Python. You can find the examples in examples folder on GitHub with detailed instructions in README.md -> Installation # We assume that you have installed software: Python 3 Docker Download and start image # First of all, you must run WhatsApp HTTP API locally (which under the hood it runs real WhatsApp Web instance and expose HTTP API for interaction).

item.title: Kotlin
item.description: We’ve created a few examples on how to interact with WAHA WhatsApp HTTP API with Kotlin (ktor). You can find the examples in examples folder on GitHub with detailed instructions in README.md -> Installation # We assume that you have installed software: Kotlin + JVM Docker Download and start image # First of all, you must run WhatsApp HTTP API locally (which under the hood it runs real WhatsApp Web instance and expose HTTP API for interaction).

item.title: Live Helper Chat
item.description: Open source Live Helper Chat -> system with mobile app, Bot, AI, Voice & Video & ScreenShare. ðŸ‘‰ Please checkout WhatsApp WAHA integration on Live Helper Chat -> documentation for more details how to integrate WhatsApp with Live Helper Chat.
